Class StorageSelectionManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.is25am33.client.view.tui.StorageSelectionManager
public class StorageSelectionManager extends Object
Utility class for managing storage selections during the reward phase. Allows tracking and validating storage choices for cargo cubes.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    StorageSelectionManager(int cubeMalus, ShipBoardClient shipBoard)
    Constructor specifically for cube malus handling.
    StorageSelectionManager(List<CargoCube> cubeRewards, int cubeMalus, ShipBoardClient shipBoard)
    Constructor for the storage selection manager.

  • Constructor Details

    • StorageSelectionManager

      public StorageSelectionManager(List<CargoCube> cubeRewards, int cubeMalus, ShipBoardClient shipBoard)
      Constructor for the storage selection manager.
      Parameters:
      cubeRewards - The list of reward cubes to assign to storages
      shipBoard - The player's ship board containing the storages

    • StorageSelectionManager

      public StorageSelectionManager(int cubeMalus, ShipBoardClient shipBoard)
      Constructor specifically for cube malus handling. Initializes the manager in malus mode for removing cubes from storages.
      Parameters:
      cubeMalus - number of cubes to remove
      shipBoard - the player's ship board containing the storages

  • Method Details

    • getCompatibleStoragesMap

      public Map<CargoCube,List<Storage>> getCompatibleStoragesMap()
      Gets the map of compatible storages for each cube type.
      Returns:
      map where key is cube type and value is list of compatible storages

    • hasAnyStorage

      public boolean hasAnyStorage()
      Checks if the player has at least one available storage.
      Returns:
      true if the player has at least one storage, false otherwise

    • addStorageSelection

      public boolean addStorageSelection(Coordinates storageCoords)
      Adds a storage to the selection for the current cube.
      Parameters:
      storageCoords - The coordinates of the selected storage
      Returns:
      true if the storage was successfully added, false otherwise

    • skipCurrentCube

      public boolean skipCurrentCube()
      Skips the current cube and moves to the next one.
      Returns:
      true if the cube was skipped, false if there are no more cubes to skip

    • getCurrentCubeImpossibilityReason

      public String getCurrentCubeImpossibilityReason()
      Checks if the current cube can be accepted and explains why if it can't.
      Returns:
      A string explaining why the cube can't be accepted, or null if it can be accepted

    • canAcceptCurrentCube

      public boolean canAcceptCurrentCube()
      Checks if the player can accept the current cube.
      Returns:
      true if the player has at least one compatible storage for the current cube

    • isSelectionComplete

      public boolean isSelectionComplete()
      Checks if all necessary storages have been selected.
      Returns:
      true if all cubes have a storage assigned, false otherwise

    • getSelectedStorageCoordinates

      public List<Coordinates> getSelectedStorageCoordinates()
      Gets the list of coordinates of the selected storages.
      Returns:
      The list of coordinates of the selected storages

    • getCurrentCube

      public CargoCube getCurrentCube()
      Returns the current cube to be assigned.
      Returns:
      The current cube or null if all cubes have been assigned

    • checkStorageStatus

      public String checkStorageStatus(Coordinates storageCoords)
      Checks if a storage is already full and provides information about the least valuable cube.
      Parameters:
      storageCoords - The coordinates of the storage to check
      Returns:
      A string describing the status of the storage, or null if it's not a valid storage

    • getTotalCubesCount

      public int getTotalCubesCount()
      Returns the total number of reward cubes to manage.
      Returns:
      The total number of reward cubes

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets all selections.

    • whereAreCube

      public Map<CargoCube,List<Coordinates>> whereAreCube()
      Gets the location of all cubes on the ship board.
      Returns:
      map where key is cube type and value is list of coordinates where cubes are stored

    • mostPreciousCube

      public List<Coordinates> mostPreciousCube()
      Gets a list of coordinates containing the most precious cubes up to cubeMalus amount. Searches in order: RED > YELLOW > GREEN > BLUE.
      Returns:
      list of coordinates containing the most precious cubes

    • getSelectableCoordinates

      public Set<Coordinates> getSelectableCoordinates(CargoCube cubeType)
      Gets the set of coordinates where a cube of the specified type can be placed.
      Parameters:
      cubeType - the type of cube to check placement for
      Returns:
      set of valid coordinates where the cube can be placed

    • addStorageSelectionWithCopy

      public boolean addStorageSelectionWithCopy(Coordinates storageCoords, CargoCube cubeType)
      Adds a storage to the selection by creating a copy to handle ObservableProperty issues.
      Parameters:
      storageCoords - coordinates of the storage to add
      cubeType - type of cube to place in the storage
      Returns:
      true if storage was successfully added, false otherwise

    • startRedistribution

      public void startRedistribution(List<CargoCube> newCubes)
      Initializes redistribution mode with bonus cubes.
      Parameters:
      newCubes - bonus cubes to add

    • selectCubeByIndex

      public boolean selectCubeByIndex(int index)
      Selects a cube by index.
      Parameters:
      index - index of the cube to select
      Returns:
      true if the selection was successful

    • getSelectedCube

      public CargoCube getSelectedCube()
      Gets the currently selected cube.
      Returns:
      the selected cube or null if none is selected

    • getAvailableCubes

      public List<CargoCube> getAvailableCubes()
      Gets the list of cubes currently available for placement.
      Returns:
      copy of the list of available cubes

    • getSelectedCubeIndex

      public int getSelectedCubeIndex()
      Gets the index of the currently selected cube.
      Returns:
      index of selected cube or -1 if none selected

    • addSelectedCubeToStorage

      public boolean addSelectedCubeToStorage(Coordinates coord)
      Adds the currently selected cube to the specified storage.
      Parameters:
      coord - coordinates of the target storage
      Returns:
      true if cube was successfully added, false otherwise

    • removeCubeFromStorageWithCopy

      public void removeCubeFromStorageWithCopy(Coordinates coords)
      Removes a cube from the specified storage and adds it back to available cubes. Creates a copy of the storage to handle ObservableProperty issues.
      Parameters:
      coords - coordinates of the storage to remove cube from

    • removeCubeFromStorage

      public void removeCubeFromStorage(Coordinates coord)
      Removes a cube from the specified storage and adds it back to available cubes.
      Parameters:
      coord - coordinates of the storage to remove cube from

    • isRedistributionComplete

      public boolean isRedistributionComplete()
      Checks if the redistribution process is complete.
      Returns:
      true if all cubes have been placed, false otherwise

    • getFinalUpdates

      public Map<Coordinates,List<CargoCube>> getFinalUpdates()
      Gets the final map of storage updates for sending to server.
      Returns:
      map of coordinates to final cube configurations

    • resetRedistribution

      public void resetRedistribution()
      Resets the redistribution state for reuse. Clears available cubes, updates map and resets mode flags.

    • isInRedistributionMode

      public boolean isInRedistributionMode()
      Checks if the manager is currently in redistribution mode.
      Returns:
      true if in redistribution mode, false otherwise

    • initializeForMalusMode

      public void initializeForMalusMode()
      Initializes the malus mode by building the cube-storage location map. Called by the constructor when malusMode is true.

    • buildCubeLocationMap

      public void buildCubeLocationMap()
      Builds a map associating cube types with storage locations containing them. Called when cube locations need to be refreshed.

    • getMostPreciousCubeAvailable

      public CargoCube getMostPreciousCubeAvailable()
      Gets the most precious cube type currently available. Follows priority: RED > YELLOW > GREEN > BLUE
      Returns:
      most precious available cube type or null if none exist

    • isValidStorageSelection

      public boolean isValidStorageSelection(Coordinates coords)
      Validates if a storage can be selected for cube removal.
      Parameters:
      coords - coordinates to validate
      Returns:
      true if selection is valid, false otherwise

    • getValidationErrorMessage

      public String getValidationErrorMessage(Coordinates coords)
      Gets error message explaining why a storage selection was invalid.
      Parameters:
      coords - coordinates that were invalid
      Returns:
      error message string

    • selectStorageForRemoval

      public boolean selectStorageForRemoval(Coordinates coords)
      Selects a storage for cube removal during malus mode.
      Parameters:
      coords - coordinates of storage to select
      Returns:
      true if selection was successful, false otherwise

    • updateCubeLocationMapAfterSelection

      public void updateCubeLocationMapAfterSelection(Coordinates coords, CargoCube removedCube)
      Updates the cube location map after removing a cube from storage.
      Parameters:
      coords - storage coordinates where cube was removed
      removedCube - type of cube that was removed

    • hasRemainingCubesToRemove

      public boolean hasRemainingCubesToRemove()
      Checks if there are still cubes that need to be removed in malus mode.
      Returns:
      true if there are remaining cubes to remove

    • getRemainingCubesToRemove

      public int getRemainingCubesToRemove()
      Gets the number of cubes that still need to be removed in malus mode.
      Returns:
      number of remaining cubes to remove

    • getSelectedStoragesForRemoval

      public List<Coordinates> getSelectedStoragesForRemoval()
      Gets the list of storage coordinates selected for cube removal.
      Returns:
      list of selected storage coordinates

    • needsBatteries

      public boolean needsBatteries()
      Checks if batteries are needed to complete the malus removal.
      Returns:
      true if batteries are needed, false otherwise

    • getRequiredBatteriesCount

      public int getRequiredBatteriesCount()
      Calculates how many batteries are needed to complete the malus removal.
      Returns:
      number of batteries required

    • hasAvailableCubes

      public boolean hasAvailableCubes()
      Checks if there are any cubes available for removal in malus mode.
      Returns:
      true if cubes are available for removal

    • getValidStorageOptionsForMostPreciousCube

      public List<Coordinates> getValidStorageOptionsForMostPreciousCube()
      Gets coordinates of storages containing the most precious available cube.
      Returns:
      list of valid storage coordinates or empty list if no cubes exist

    • resetMalusState

      public void resetMalusState()
      Resets the malus mode state. Clears selected storages, cube locations and counters.

    • isInMalusMode

      public boolean isInMalusMode()
      Checks if the manager is currently in malus mode.
      Returns:
      true if in malus mode, false otherwise
